product_name: Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: From day hikes to ultralight backpacking, the Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack covers it all with a 3-liter hydration reservoir and a top-loading design that makes the most of every inch of space.
short_description: From day hikes to ultralight backpacking, the Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack covers it all with a 3-liter hydration reservoir and a top-loading design that makes the most of every inch of space.
